rules_text:
This spell can’t be countered.
Tap up to three target permanents.
Coalesce {9}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {9}{U}{U}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
Opponents can’t untap more than two permanents during their untap steps while Drown Amidst the Cosmos is on the battlefield.
